protein.specific_function: Isoform MOCS1A and isoform MOCS1B probably form a complex that catalyzes the conversion of 5'-GTP to cyclic pyranopterin monophosphate (cPMP or molybdopterin precursor Z).

reference.reference_text: Reiss J, Cohen N, Dorche C, Mandel H, Mendel RR, Stallmeyer B, Zabot MT, Dierks T: Mutations in a polycistronic nuclear gene associated with molybdenum cofactor deficiency. Nat Genet. 1998 Sep;20(1):51-3.
